ComicInfo.Summary: For centuries, Mankind has feared the coming of the Antichrist, the Beast of Revelations. Unknown to the rest of the world, he has arrived in the person of Az Rabah. Claiming to be the Mandi and possessing the power to prove it, Az Rabah threatens to unite the Arab nations in a bloody jihad against the rest of the world. The Vatican's strike force and Areala battle conventional and supernatural forces as they assault the desert stronghold of Az Rabah.
